entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.2°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 88 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:32 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:32 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
